title: Activate menubar in reading mode
instructions: Navigate to the 'Font" menu item in the 'Text Formatting' menubar example with down arrow. | Activate the 'Font' menu
assertion1: Change of mode from reading to interaction is conveyed

title: Navigate to menubar with commands that switch mode from reading to interaction
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the link just before the menubar
assertion1: Change of mode from reading to interaction is conveyed

title: Navigate to menubar in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the link just before the menubar
assertion2: The menubar name 'Text Formatting' is conveyed
assertion3: The menu item name "Font" is conveyed
assertion4: Availability of a submenu is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed

title: Navigate to menu item in menubar in reading mode
instructions: Navigate to 'Text Formatting' menu with down arrow| Navigate to 'Style/Color' menu
assertion2: Availability of a submenu is conveyed
assertion3: 2: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed
assertion5: 2: Open state of the submenu is conveyed

title: Navigate to menu item in menubar in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Font' menu item
assertion2: Availability of a submenu is conveyed
assertion3: 2: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed
assertion5: 2: Open state of the submenu is conveyed

title: Open submenu in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Text Align' menu item
instructions: Open 'Text Align' submenu and move focus to 'Left' menu item
assertion2: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion3: 2: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed

title: Open submenu in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Text Align' menu item
instructions: Open 'Text Align' submenu and move focus to 'Left' menu item
assertion2: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion3: 2: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed

title: Close submenu in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Text Align' menu item
instructions: Open 'Text Align' submenu and move focus to the 'Left' menu item using down arrow key | Close submenu and return focus to 'Text Align' menu item
assertion2: Availability of a submenu is conveyed
assertion3: 2: Closed state of the submenu is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed

title: Navigate to menu item radio in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Font' menu item
instructions: Open "Font" menu using the down arrow key | Navigate to 'Monospace' menu item
assertion2: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed

title: Navigate to menu item checkbox in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Style/Color' menu item
instructions: Open "Style/Color" menu using the down arrow key | Navigate to 'Italic' menu item
assertion2: The role 'menu item checkbox' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The name and role of the 'Font Style' group are conveyed

title: Read menu item in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: Move focus to the 'Size' menu item
instructions: Review the  'Size' menu item in the menubar
assertion2: Availability of a submenu is conveyed
assertion3: 2: Closed state of the submenu is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed

title: Read menu item in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Move focus to the 'Size' menu item
instructions: Review the  'Size' menu item in the menubar
assertion2: Availability of a submenu is conveyed
assertion3: 2: Closed state of the submenu is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed

title: Read menu item radio in interaction mode
task: read menuitemradio in a group in a submenu
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Style/Color' menu item
instructions: Open "Style/Color" menu using the down arrow key | Navigate to 'Blue' menu item using the down arrow key | Review the  'Blue' menu item radio button
assertion2: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The name and role of the 'Text Color' group are conveyed

title: Read menu item radio in interaction mode
task: read menuitemradio in a group in a submenu
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Style/Color' menu item
instructions: Open "Style/Color" menu using the down arrow key | Use VO+Shift+Up Arrow to start DOM navigation of the menubar groups | Navigate to the "Color" group using VO + Down Arrow | Navigate to the "Color" group items using VO + Shift + Down Arrow | Navigate to 'Blue' menu item using VO + Down Arrow Key | Review the  'Blue' menu item radio button
assertion2: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The name and role of the 'Text Color' group are conveyed

title: Read menu item checkbox in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Style/Color' menu item
instructions: Open "Style/Color" menu using the down arrow key | Navigate to 'Italic' menu item using the down arrow key | Review the 'Italic' menu item
assertion2: The role 'menu item checkbox' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The name and role of the 'Font Style' group are conveyed

title: Read disabled menu item in interaction mode
task: read disabled menuitem in a submenu
setupScriptDescription: Moves focus to the 'Size' menu item
instructions: Open "Size" menu using the down arrow key | Navigate to 'X-Large" menuitem using the down arrow key | Activate "X-Large" menu item using the space key |Open "Size" menu using the down arrow key | Navigate to 'Larger" menuitem using the down arrow key | Review the 'Larger' menu item
assertion4: 2: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed
